title: Feature Agglomeration for High-Dimensional Data
description: This tutorial will demonstrate how to use feature agglomeration to merge similar features in a dataset. Feature agglomeration is useful when working with high-dimensional datasets by reducing the number of features while preserving the most important information.

meta.title: Feature Agglomeration for High-Dimensional Data
meta.description: Learn how to use feature agglomeration to reduce the number of features in high-dimensional datasets while preserving important information.
meta.keywords: machine learning, high dimensional data, data reduction, feature agglomeration, scikit-learn, scikit-learn playground, data preprocessing
